Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Racine
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses temp. rerouted EB: Roosevelt, Throop, Washburne and Racine; WB Racine, 13th, Loomis, Roosevelt and Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Racine.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Throop, Washburne and Racine.

Westbound buses will operate via Racine, 13th, Loomis, Roosevelt and Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
